node.title: Suspected murders of Sydney gay men at centre of inquiry into brutal hate crimes
node.alt: a man sitting on a bench
node.description: The NSW government announces long-awaited inquiry looking at historical "grave injustices" committed against Sydney's gay community.
node.content:
["The NSW government has announced an inquiry into brutal hates crimes committed against members of Sydney's gay community over 40 years.", "In July 1989, 25-year-old newsreader Ross Warren disappeared from Sydney's eastern suburbs.", "His car had been parked on a street near the popular gay beat Marks Park, and his keys were found at the bottom of a cliff nearby.", "Police closed his case just three weeks later, without locating his body.", "Ross is suspected to be among the dozens of men murdered\u00a0in Sydney through the 1980s and 1990s.", "They will form the basis of a judicial inquiry announced by the NSW government on Wednesday.", "\"'LGBTI members of our community have suffered grave injustices that were not acceptable in the past and they are not acceptable now,\" NSW Premier Dominic Perrottet said.\u00a0", "\"Where there is still work to be done to address these injustices, we will do it.\"", "", "
Police initially floated the idea that WIN presenter Ross Warren had staged his disappearance.(NSW Police)
", "The inquiry, which will investigate crimes committed between 1970 and 2010, was one of the key recommendations in a report tabled by the Legislative Council's Standing Committee on Social Issues in May.", "The Committee began a parliamentary inquiry into the issue in 2018.", "Committee Chair Shayne Mallard said there was evidence of at least 88 gay and transgender murders, though the number was likely higher.", "\"[Crimes were] under-reported or not correctly recorded,\" he said.", "\"[People in the] lesbian community were victims of gay hate murders as well, usually recorded as domestic violence.\"", "The judicial inquiry will have the power to compel witnesses to appear and give evidence.", "\"It will have a lot more power than the police or my inquiry to get to the bottom of these murders,\" Mr Mallard said.", "\"The police have suspects... they have people in their sights, let's flush them out. They're walking among our community today.\"\u00a0", "The Australian Council of Aids Organisations (ACON), an LGBTQI+ advocacy group,\u00a0welcomed the announcement.", "", "
A memorial to victims of gay hate crimes has been built at Marks Parks in Tamarama.(Supplied:\u00a0Marton Dobras-Vincze)
", "\"These crimes took place at a time when many in the community thought gay and transgender people were sick, perverted or criminals,\" chief executive Nicolas Parkhill said.\u00a0", "\"That was reflected not only in terms of the horrific acts of violence committed against us, but also how the system responded apathetically and with inertness to these atrocities.", "\"We hope this inquiry will be the next step towards healing and justice for their families and loved ones.\"\u00a0", "Mr Mallard said it was an emotional day.", "\"I'm a gay man myself, I've gone into public office to achieve good, and you don't get many chances like this.\"", "Details about the content of the inquiry, including its terms of reference, are yet to be released.", "Last month a memorial was unveiled at Marks Park in Tamarama, the site of many suspected murders, to acknowledge and honour the victims of gay hate crimes."]
